eu_initiatives:
Policies: Culture and Creative Industries / Education 
Programmes: Creative Europe / Erasmus+ 
Initiatives: European Union Prize for Literature / Prix du Livre Européen / Creative Hubs / Intercultural Dialogue 
Legislative files: Establishing the Creative Europe Programme (2014 to 2020) / Better services for skills and qualifications (Europass)
goals__remit: Parodi & Partners provides professional advice about EU policies, programmes and projects in the fields of culture and education.
relevant_communication:
Development of creative hub about literature & bookselling (Librebook) / development of a network of professionals in the EU cultural fields / organisation of cultural events with EU Commission, MEPS and EU countries' embassies. 
Participation in current EU projects: Erasmus+ project “SKILLS FOR FREEDOM – Artistic paths to develop the professional skills of prisoners” / Erasmus+ project “Festivals. Pas-de-deux européen, économique et culturel”​
